description:
Alejandro Mayorkas joined the Institute of Politics at Harvard Kennedy School and doubled down on opening the border while ignoring the damage he caused to Americans.

NEW: Fmr DHS Sec Mayorkas speaks out about regrets over his handling of the border… unclear exactly what he means by a “decline in empiricism” but worth noting: raw data, stats and live footage of thousands of migrants illegally pouring across the border are about as empirical… pic.twitter.com/LgKyhWFjP4
— Griff Jenkins (@GriffJenkins) March 7, 2025
title: Alejandro Mayorkas resurfaces, declares he's "very proud" of Biden's open border policies

description:
This year has been quiet in terms of airline freakouts but 2025 could have just gotten off to a slow start, as this latest Southwest freakout is more shocking than you think.

A woman, who may or may not have taken too much Ambien, decided to strip naked on a flight from Houston to Phoenix and proceeded to traumatize passengers.

NEW: Female Astronaut forces Southwest flight to return to gate after running n*ked up and down the aisle for 25 minutes

The woman stripped n*ked during a Southwest flight from Houston to Phoenix on Monday

She paraded around the plane for 25 minutes before authorities… pic.twitter.com/HIGQfzryC0
— Unlimited L's (@unlimited_ls)
title: Woman has a bizarre episode in the first naked airplane meltdown of the year

description:
According to Coachella Councilmember Yadira Perez, her husband "wasn't perfect." And by that, she means he broke federal immigration laws and racked up an "extensive criminal record" while living illegally in this country.

So, while Perez may have thought this was perfectly normal, considering no one has yet to hold her husband accountable, he was arrested as part of "targeted enforcement action.”

NEW: California councilwoman's illegal immigrant husband gets arrested by federal agents in a Walmart parking lot.

Yadira Perez is distraught as her husband, Isidro Jimenez-Ibanez, now faces deportation.

Jimenez-Ibanez has an "extensive criminal record," as reported by Newsweek… pic.twitter.com/iGgprd4Cn1
— Collin
title: A California council woman's illegal immigrant husband (with a criminal record) gets deported, and she doesn't handle it well
